controls.ctestplanmanagement.interfaces

Interface ITestPlanManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TestListenable, TestPlanListenable, TestPlanPanelListenable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestPlanManagementFacade

    public interface ITestPlanManagement
extends TestPlanListenable, TestListenable, TestPlanPanelListenable
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Lecoconnier david.lecoconnier@gmail.com, Jean-Luc Amitousa-Mankoy jeanluc.amitousa.mankoy@gmail.com

        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

        count - number of affected slaves
